source_description: Feature 021: Field Naming Consistency Refactor - Rename purchase_unit to package_unit, purchase_quantity to package_unit_quantity on Product model. Standardize internal pantry references to inventory across database, models, services, tests, and UI code while preserving user-facing Pantry labels. Update import/export spec to v3.4. Use export/reset/import workflow per Constitution v1.2.0.
